news.title: Tech stocks lead Wall Street sell-off as tensions over Greenland escalate
news.summary: Tech stocks led declines on Tuesday as renewed trade rhetoric tied to Greenland fueled a risk-off move across U.S. markets. Tech stocks led decline on Tuesday.

news.title: Trump is showing the world the U.S. is 'back,' Scott Bessent tells CNBC as Greenland tensions ratchet up
news.summary: U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent spoke to CNBC. He said President Donald Trump's bid to acquire Greenland is 'not something new'

news.title: Trump threatens 200% tariff on French wines as Macron reportedly snubs 'Board of Peace' seat
news.summary: Trump also reiterated his plans to control Greenland, saying that European leaders "won't push back too much" Trump: "We're going to be in charge of Greenland for the next 100 years"

news.title: Bessent says Trump's pick for the next Fed chair could happen next week
news.summary: The president has whittled down the field to four candidates, Bessent told CNBC. The president was speaking at the World Economic Forum in Switzerland.

news.title: Netflix amends Warner Bros. Discovery offer to all cash
news.summary: Netflix has agreed to pay $27.75 per WBD share to acquire the company's studio and streaming assets. The deal is expected to close in the next few weeks.

news.title: Netflix bolsters its bid for Warner Bros. by making it all cash
news.summary: The change addresses one of Paramount’s arguments of why its buyout bid was better than that of Netflix — it didn’t include stock.

news.title: How Greenland could turn into a Big Tech problem, according to Morgan Stanley’s Mike Wilson
news.summary: U.S.-Europe spat over Greenland could be bad for tech. Strategists like Morgan Stanley’s chief U.S. equity strategist say fallout from the spat could be big.

news.title: Elon Musk and Ryanair’s CEO call each other ‘idiots.’ The numbers say something else.
news.summary: Elon Musk and Michael O’Leary are calling each other idiots. But shareholders of both companies would reject that charge. Musk and O'Leary are both worth billions of dollars.

news.title: 3M’s earnings beat can’t save the stock from the broad-market selloff
news.summary: Shares of 3M slip in early Tuesday trading. The Post-it Notes, Scotch tape and Command strips maker’s quarterly earnings beat and in-line profit outlook was overshadowed by a broad-market selloff.

news.title: Ask these 3 questions before deciding whether to do your own taxes or hire a pro
news.summary: Tax filing season starts Jan. 26 and it’s the first with Trump big new tax law on the books. Tax filing season is the first time taxpayers will be able to file under the new law.
